original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sakabaḷena mukhena byāharanti …pe….
analyzed: ▁tena ▁kho ▁pana ▁samayena ▁chabbaggiyā ▁bhikkhū ▁sak ab a ḷ ena ▁mukh ena ▁byā har anti ▁pe
▁na ▁sak ab a ḷ ena ▁mukh ena ▁byā har issāmīti ▁sikkhā ▁ karaṇīy āti
▁na ▁sak ab a ḷ ena ▁mukh ena ▁byā har itabbaṃ

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca sakabaḷena mukhena byāharati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: ▁yo ▁anādar iyaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁sak ab a ḷ ena ▁mukh ena ▁byā har ati ▁āpatti ▁dukkaṭassa
